Defiler's Doom.name: Defiler's Doom
Defiler's Doom.flavor: A target that flees from your first attack is drawn back to face a second.
Defiler's Doom.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. If the target is not adjacent to you at the end of its next turn, you teleport it to a square adjacent to you and make a melee basic attack against it as a free action.

Form of the Life-Giver.name: Form of the Life-Giver
Form of the Life-Giver.flavor: You appear to increase in size as you take on the form of the legendary life-giver, granting vitality to your allies.
Form of the Life-Giver.effect:
You assume the guardian form of the life-giver until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, your size is Large. In addition, you gain resist 20 necrotic. Any ally that starts his or her turn within 3 squares of you regains 5 hit points.
Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Life-Giver Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Life-Giver.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone. The target is stunned (save ends).
Form of the Life-Giver.eachFailedSavingThrow: One ally within 3 squares of the target can spend a healing surge.
Form of the Life-Giver.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Form of the Life-Giver.requirement: The power Form of the Life-Giver must be active in order to use this power.

Preservation of the Wild.name: Preservation of the Wild
Preservation of the Wild.flavor: The spirits of nature destroy lingering magic at your command.
Preservation of the Wild.effect: All conjurations and zones in the burst are destroyed. In addition, ongoing necrotic damage ends on each creature in the burst.
